name: Saturn–Neptune conjunction (outer-planet conjunction)
desc: A “collapse + rebuilding” configuration: dissolution of old structures, restructuring of collective beliefs and systems.

name: Uranus ingress into Gemini (change of sign / mode,
desc: Signals 7-year period of upheaval: accelerated communication, information flows, technological disruption, rapid change — often tied to innovation, volatility, generational shifts.

name: Neptune ingress into Aries (outer-planet sign change)
desc: A generational shift: symbolically, a move from collective spirituality/illusion (Pisces) to more pioneering, initiatory, assertive energy (Aries) — often interpreted as emerging new paradigms, radical shifts in values/institutions.

name: Period of “outer-planet cooperation” — sextiles / trines among Jupiter, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto (sometimes called “the basket”)
desc: Viewed as a time of structural regeneration, creative innovation, and perhaps major shifts in geopolitics, economics, technology — a “window” for hopeful reorganization.

name: Generational shift: Jupiter–Uranus conjunction (beginning of new Jupiter-Uranus cycle)
desc: Associated with technological breakthroughs, market booms or transforms (esp. in tech, energy, innovation sectors), societal restructuring — a high-change, high-opportunity era (but also risk).

name: Great Conjunction of Jupiter and Saturn (next one)
desc: Outside your 10-year horizon, but worth noting: historically such conjunctions mark deep structural shifts in collective financial/political orders.
